decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations would consist of any other alteration to the dwelling house within the meaning of Class G of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (Amendment) (No. 2) (England) Order 2008 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class G. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The applicant is advised that should the development proposed under this Certificate of Lawfulness application adjoin the proposed development under planning application 21/P2593 then planning permission would be required for the whole development.

Condition : 4 - In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:

   i) Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
   ii) Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
   iii) As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.

In this instance:

   i) The applicant/agent was provided with pre-application advice.
   ii) The application was acceptable as submitted and no further assistance was required.
   iii) The application was approved without delay.
   iv) The application was considered by the Planning Committee where the applicant/agent had the opportunity to speak to the committee and promote the application.
description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE FOR A PROPOSED REAR ROOF EXTENSION WITH ROOFLIGHT AND RAISING THE PARTY WALL
